      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RecordCollection.addRecord(Record r) 
      abstract void AbstractRecordCollection.addRecord(Record r)
      Simple method to add a record to the collection.
      void Index.createIndex()
      Working method to index the collection based on keyword similarity The approach works only if the keyVectors have been generated.
      AbstractRecord RecordCollection.findClosestRecord() 
      abstract AbstractRecord AbstractRecordCollection.findClosestRecord()
      Search method to find the closest record in the collection (In practice, the top record once the collection is sorted) Equivalent to findClosestRecords(1) - hence requirement #(this)>0
      java.util.List<Record> RecordCollection.findClosestRecords(int n) 
      abstract java.util.List<Record> AbstractRecordCollection.findClosestRecords(int n)
      Search method to find the n closest records in the collection (In practice, the top n records once the collection is sorted)
      java.util.List<Record> Index.queryListing(java.lang.String query, int matches)
      Method to locate the listings most similar to the query Searches for titles in the collection
